title: Karnataka Student Alleges Brother Attacked, Links Violence To Hijab Row - NDTV
content:
1. Karnataka Student Alleges Brother Attacked, Links Violence To Hijab Row  NDTV
  2. Muslim teen 'bashed up' by police in Karnataka for entering classroom clad in a skull cap and 'creating ruckus'  The New Indian Express
  3. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Hazra Shifa, a student from Karnataka's Udupi and one of the petitioners in the hijab ban case, has alleged that her brother was attacked by a mob of right-wing supporters, linking the violence to her decision to continue to wear a hijab.
